L-Shape Profile Definition
==========================



```
concept {
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:ProfileType -> IfcProfileTypeEnum
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:ProfileName -> IfcLabel
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_0
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Position -> IfcAxis2Placement2D_1
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Depth -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_0
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Width -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_1
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:Thickness -> IfcPositiveLengthMeasure_2
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:FilletRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_0
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:EdgeRadius -> IfcNonNegativeLengthMeasure_1
    IfcLShapeProfileDef:LegSlope -> IfcPlaneAngleMeasure
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:Location -> IfcCartesianPoint_1
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_0
    IfcAxis2Placement2D_0:RefDirection -> IfcDirection_1
}
```
